name: Viper - Nikke: Goddess of Victory
description:
Note #1: Remove the trigger word if you want to change her outfit. It's there to really try to push the outfit while keeping flexibility.

What does it do you ask? Viper is the best waifu from Nikke. That's all that has to be said. Is it the fishnets? The skirt? Probably. I think her visuals are just pretty freaking dope and I wanted to make a Lora that let's me use her on multiple (including realistic) models.

How to use it:

(I use Sampling Method DPM++ SDE Karras and Upscaler R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B).

0.9 ~ 1 and trigger word for the base outfit. 0.7 to 0.8 and trigger word removal for changes.

Main Triggers

VPRN - Use this if you want her outfit. Don't use if it you want to change her around with costumes.

For Clothing Changes

Remove the trigger word and use 0.6 to 0.7 weight.

And then whatever else you want!

Extra, Extra!: Should be well trained and usable in most models. Images shown for example.

Picture Descriptions:

1-2: AnythingV3 with just this Lora.

3: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Gothic Chick Locon.

4: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Masked Evil Locon.

5: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Racer Queen Locon.

6: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Stepped On Locon.

7: AnythingV3 combo'd with my released Brainwashing Machine Locon.

8: AnythingV3 combo'd with my in progress Mind Flayer Mindwipe Locon.

9: AbyssOrange using just this Lora.

10: RevAnimated using just this Lora.

11: ChilloutMix using just this Lora.

How was it trained?

It was trained on animefull_final with 27 images with the usual self-pruning and tagging and a wide range of different images. I like keeping my prompts simple for the first few pictures so that you can see it without a whole bunch of mumbo jumbo. Make your pictures better than mine though!

What's next for this?

I think it's fine? LMK.

What's next that isn't this?

More character Loras. (Rupee from Nikke, Spectre Tenebria from E7, Zephia from Fire Emblem Engage, Ivy from Soul Calibur 5, Heine from Combatants Will Be Dispatched, Conqueror Lilias from E7, Evelynn from LoL (both base and All Out version), Tharja from Fire Emblem, Laharl-Chan from Disgaea 5, Miku from Idaten Deities, Kuribayashi Shino from GATE, Rin Sohma from Fruits Basket, Kasumi from P5, Ann from P5, Ikumi Mito from Food Wars, Alice Nakiri from Food Wars, Chika Fujiwara from Kaguya-sama, Lulu from FF10, Momo from My Hero, Lucoa from Dragon Maid, Laharl-chan from Disgaea, Dominique de Sade from Vanitas, and Dos from One Punch Man.) And maybe Wilhelm van Astrea, my favorite Re:Zero husbando or a Prinny from Disgaea.

V2's of some of the previous Loras. Specifically make them more diversely acceptable with other models and LORA's.

I also have some more quite NSFW Locon's. I decided to list them as well, so if people have preferences on which to fix up first let me know. Specifically, Bound Yuri (two girls tied up, breast to breast and likely kissing), Sultry Succubus Transformation, Tied up with vibrators (basically the waifu tied up with vibrators and being overwhelmed with pleasure), Beta Censorship (Automatically censors any images you create to make them BetaSafe), Demonic Transformation, being stepped on, Robotification, Defeated (decently NSFW defeat scenario for the waifu getting abused), Petrified (I'm unsure if I should bother with this one anymore), Infection (this one is VERY nsfw, as the waifu is completely infected), Dominatrix (waifu becoming a dominatrix), Tentacles, Pillory, Masked Evil (A mask that possess' the waifu), Latex Corruption, Combat Drone (hard to describe but basically making them a mindless sci-fi combat warrior), JAV Supervillain, Mind Flayer Defeat, Blacked, Hypnotized Harem, Hourglass Figure (just to make your waifu curvy), and Holding a Leash.

And, uh, I want to make a few SFW Locon's so I have a Goth Chick, Delinquent (The delinquent girls in japanese schools specifically), GoodCop/BadCop (Locon with outfits for being a good and for being a bad cop), Maid (both normal and naughty variants), Biker Chick (ride a motorcycle and look like you should), Race Queen (Chiling sexily on a car), forest fairy, Anime Officer, barbarian.

Or just give me some random suggestion or priority opinions. That works too.

I've also added a couple of my extreme NSFW preview images to my twitter (https://twitter.com/TwoMoreTimes89). Let me know if you think I should work on them more for a submission here.
